Ciencias.Core

Class AnsweredQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • Ciencias.Core.AnsweredQuestion

  • public class AnsweredQuestion
extends java.lang.Object
    A modification to the Question class for use in the results renderer.
    Author:
    Paul Alves

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AnsweredQuestion(Question q, java.lang.String cAns, java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> ansList)
      Constructs an answered question object

      Creates an answered question object without a Question object available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AnsweredQuestion

        public AnsweredQuestion(Question q,
                java.lang.String cAns,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> ansList)
        Constructs an answered question object
        Parameters:
        q - The question to base this object on
        cAns - The index of the correct answer
        ansList - The list of answers. Index 0 is the answer itself, index 1 is how many students picked the answer, and index 2 is a comma separated list of student's names who picked that answer

      • AnsweredQuestion

        public AnsweredQuestion(java.lang.String text,
                java.lang.String img,
                java.lang.String tag,
                int num,
                java.lang.String correctAns,
                java.lang.String type,
                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> ans)
        Creates an answered question object without a Question object available.
        Parameters:
        text - The question's text
        img - The question's image.
        tag - The question's tag
        num - The question's number
        correctAns - The correct answer to the question
        type - The type of question
        ans - An array list containing answers. (index 0 is the answer itself, index 1 is how many students picked the answer, and index 2 is a comma separated list of student's names who picked that answer)

      • getQuestionGraphPosition

        public int getQuestionGraphPosition()
        Returns the amount of students who chose the correct answer NOTE: This method is only used for the consolidation process. To get question graph posses from a CTMR file, use CTMRParser.getQuestionGraphPos
        Returns:
        the amount of students who chose the correct answer
